lines.text: Look what you've done! You've taken away the only ape I ever loved! Are you happy now?
Well, you won't be for long, buddy!
Inka Dinka Doo says... the time has come!
I never knew any problem that couldn't be solved without a little nap!
I'm out of here, Banana Slamma!
I don't know, but it's kinda catchy!
You see, the thing I don't remember most is being a Kroc. You're sure I'm not some kind of monkey?
Boy, you'd be as Kroc as they come, Donkey Kroc! Sees for yerself!
[Skurvy pulls a mirror frame in front of Donkey Kong and mimics his every move]
